entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Runtime Async Experiment #94620
    9.0.0
  • IlcStandaloneGCSupport Not Working For NativeAoT #94618
  • System numerics abort at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #94610
  • dotnet core cannot load FIPS built shared library in linux #94598
    Future
  • [wasm] Build doesn't rebuild when certain properties change #94595
    9.0.0
  • Xamarin MAUI iOS using .NET 7 & 8 and OData client throwing Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper dynamic-method) #94594
  • {U}Int128 divided by 0 throws wrong exception type #94593

Closed

  • Pinning ROS with known length causes unnecessary code generation. #94559
    9.0.0
  • AV in LibraryImport tests #93155
  • ILLink : InvalidCastException in AssemblyReferencesCorrector #93796
  • JIT: Redundant code when Span index is known to be out-of-bounds #13773
    Future
  • JIT: dead stores are not eliminated #13727
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] library tests broken on `main` #94596
    9.0.0
  • Exclude properties of delegate types in configuration source generator #94117
    9.0.0
  • Chrome / Chromium 119 Breaks .NET 6.0.0 Webassembly - Update SDK & Runtime to 6.0.24 to Mitigate #94570
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect GNU linker detection when cross-compiling on non-GNU-linker host OS #94355
  • [wasm] Implement ValueTask marshaling #61368
    Future
  • Determinism for NativeAOT #73931
    Future
  • Emit Contention/Start and Contention/Stop Events on Native AOT Apps #76754
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind reports Native AOT shared library memory leaks #81008
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #91769
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • try different arm32 images #94616
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasi][wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage to the AppBuilders #94615
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94612
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 8.0.x
  • [NO-MERGE][8.0] Update alpine arm32 in release 8.0 CI #94609
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Implement StoreVectorAndZipNxM for Arm64 #94607
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sve: Early versions of Intrinsics/Arm/Sve and hwintrinsiclistarm64sve #94606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94602
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • [browser][MT] GC coop safepoints #94601
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] pool don't yield to event loop #94600
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Search less assertion prop #94597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Switch StandaloneApp6x to pre-built test asset #94590
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: Sparse conditional propagation in value numbering #94563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct native type in test marshallers #93432
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: fix cross block assertion prop #94608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] no threads #94599
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94588
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94506
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.2
  • [browser] Remove ValueTask interop test placeholders #94560
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Disallow inlining Main #94449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Initial patch to fix RISCV64 interpreter #94548
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Print finally clone stats with JitTimeLogCsv #94533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing (16) #94525
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [System.Numerics] Cross Product for Vector2 and Vector4 #87968
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow preinitializing RuntimeType instances #94405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing (13) #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [docs] Add Mono Library Mode and update Mono Profiled AOT #94578
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94577
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
